title: ACMI Animation Open Studios: three weekends in September and October 2007
brief_description: Three animators - Dave Jones, Nick Hilligoss, Steve Piscopo - participated in three weekends over September and October 2007 in the ACMI Animation Open Studios (as part of Pixar) sharing their secrets with people of all ages. Using a combination of moving image, stills and animation to a music soundtrack, this is a record of what took place.
